org.certificateservices.custom.c2x.common.validator

Interface RegionValidator

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BaseRegionValidator, CountryOnlyRegionValidator

    public interface RegionValidator
    Interface for implementing

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void validateRegion(GeographicRegion checkRegion, Certificate[] certificateChain)
      Method to verify that the region in certificate matches the requirement in the issuer certificate.

    • Method Detail

      • validateRegion

        void validateRegion(GeographicRegion checkRegion,
                    Certificate[] certificateChain)
             throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                    InvalidCertificateException
        Method to verify that the region in certificate matches the requirement in the issuer certificate. If certificate is self-signed it ignore the certificate.
        Parameters:
        checkRegion - the expected region to validate the certificate for.
        certificateChain - the certificate to verify region in, end entity certificate first and root cert last.
        Throws:
        InvalidCertificateException - if region in given certificate was invalid.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if other argument was invalid not related to the region in the certificate.
